actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the excessing of cabin sites and removal of cabins located at Conchas Lake, N. Mex., prior to 1966 without State approval.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Army from determining a 45-acre cabin site at Conchas Lake, New Mexico, to be in excess of project needs prior to 1996 unless such determination is agreed to by the Governor of New Mexico. Prohibits the Secretary from requiring the removal or sale and purchase of cabins or other privately owned improvements unless agreed to by the Governor of New Mexico.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the excessing of cabin sites and removal of cabins located at Conchas Lake, N. Mex., prior to 1966 without State approval.
